pr_title: LSP: Hoover the mouse over identifier shows JavaDoc.

timeline.message: LSP: Hoover the mouse over identifier shows JavaDoc
Generate Constructor source action throws InvocationTargetException - fixed.

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't this test too JDK specific? What if the wording of the Javadoc changes between the various JDKs? Then the test would fail.
It might be safer to create own class with Javadoc and test against it. That one would be stable.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach
